General.Name: Beijing Compass Technology Develop
General.Description: Beijing Compass Technology Development Co., Ltd. develops and delivers securities analysis software and securities information solutions in China. The company was formerly known as Beijing Compass Securities Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Compass Technology Development Co., Ltd. in April 2001. Beijing Compass Technology Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Compass Building, Block A, Beijing, China, 102209
